title: Room wanted for a couple weeks
body:
QR Code Link to This Post


Hi,

I'm a Canadian student who had to come over for family and now I can't get home. Unfortunately due to the circumstances it's a little difficult to keep staying with my extended family and waiting this out in a hotel is a bit out of my price range. I'm hoping I could pay about 100 a week for just a room in London somewhere ideally near transit? I know I'm asking a lot since it's an expensive city and I don't know exactly how long it will take to make my way home.

Thanks for reading
-Tanya
